com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface Geometry

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable
All Known Subinterfaces:
Curve, FeatureGeometry, GeometryCollection, MPointCollection, MultiPoint, MZPointCollection, Path, PointCollection, Polygon, Polyline, Ring, Segment, SegmentCollection
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFeatureGeometry, BaseGeometry, BaseGeometryArray, BaseLineSegments, BaseMultiPoint, BasePath, BasePointsArray, BasePolygon, BasePolyline, BaseRing, Envelope, Line, MBasePointsArray, MZBasePointsArray, Point
public interface Geometry
extends Cloneable

This is the public interface for 2D ESRI geometry objects.

Method Summary
 Object clone()
          Returns a copy of the geometry.
 Envelope getEnvelope()
          Determines the bounding box of the geometry.

Method Detail

clone

public Object clone()
Returns a copy of the geometry.

Overrides:
clone in class Object
Returns:
the geometry copy

getEnvelope

public Envelope getEnvelope()
Determines the bounding box of the geometry. This method always returns a new envelope.

Returns:
the envelope bounding box

getEnvelope

public Envelope getEnvelope(Envelope e)
Determines the bounding box of the geometry. If an envelope is used as the argument, its value will be updated and returned. If null is used as the argument, a new envelope will be returned.

Parameters:
e - the envelope to update
Returns:
the envelope bounding box

getEnvelopeByRef

public Envelope getEnvelopeByRef()
Determines the bounding box of the geometry. This method returns a reference to an existing envelope.

This method is provided to reduce memory consumption and should be used with care. Modifications should not be made to the returned envelope. Implementing classes are free to return an actual reference or a completely new object providing it is stated in the method's documentation.

Returns:
the envelope bounding box
